testcase.classname: Rick and Morty API Website Navigation
testcase.name: Explore the About page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on "https://rickandmortyapi.com/"................................passed When I click on the "About" link............................................passed Then I should be redirected to the about page...............................passed And I should see information about the technical stuff......................passed And I should see "Axel Fuhrmann" mentioned..................................passed

testcase.name: Get character by ID
testcase.system-out: Given I request character with id 1.........................................passed Then the response should contain the name "Rick Sanchez"....................passed
